title: criptobliznec
author: criptobliznec
content: Observing the development trend of the DAO, one involuntarily comes to the conclusion, namely, that the DAO treasury has grown 20 times in 2022. What contributes to such progress in the blockchain, I propose to consider a little more.As we head into the current year of 2023, I would like to highlight what is in store for DAO DeXe Network investors. The DAO DeXe constructor provides flexible reward settings and easy treasury management. This is the approach used by the DAO Treasury Management protocol. How far and how deep will DAOs enter the mainstream and in what use cases. To do this, you need to know and understand what the treasury is capable of. DAO DeXe offers what many have been looking for. Do you want to create your own blockchain product by writing a contract with an address? Please, no problem, no coding required. Do you use NFT, which is popular among the cryptocurrency community today? May be!The main problem of every existing DAO remains solutions within its own DAO or its products https://dexenetwork.medium.com/case-study-how-daos-can-reward-members-2fa23d4244a2In DAO DeXe, the solution is to make any DAO offering available to every member of the community.User participation in the DAO also increased dramatically during 2022. DAOs are becoming a natural digital dream for the future. So, let's build our future together with DAO DeXe Network https://dexe.network/
